eligibility_criteria.criterion: A minimum of 5 years of existence
eligibility_criteria.reason: The proposal states that Quantum Analytics Consulting has over 15 years of global experience. Additionally, Annexure 1 includes the Certificate of Incorporation, which serves as proof of existence.

eligibility_criteria.criterion: The Agency should have a minimum Annual Turnover of Rs. 50 Cr. during each of the 3 financial years i.e., FY 2020-21, FY 2021-22, and FY 2022-23
eligibility_criteria.reason: The proposal only includes the financial statement for FY 2022-23 (Annexure 2). There is no mention of financial statements or certificates for FY 2020-21 and FY 2021-22.

eligibility_criteria.criterion: The Agency should have completed a minimum of 5 studies/projects (AI related/tech-policy related/competition related/sectoral studies for policy purposes)
eligibility_criteria.reason: The proposal mentions that Quantum Analytics Consulting has conducted over 50 studies globally on technology's impact on market structures, including ten in AI and competition. Annexure 3 includes copies of completion certificates for relevant past projects.

eligibility_criteria.criterion: The Agency should not have been blacklisted by Central/State Government Departments/Undertakings/Court of Law
eligibility_criteria.reason: The proposal does not include a No Conviction/Debarment Certificate as per Annexure-3, which is required to prove that the agency has not been blacklisted.

eligibility_criteria.criterion: The agency should have a valid PAN and Service Tax/GST Registration in India (if applicable)
eligibility_criteria.reason: The proposal does not include a self-attested copy of the PAN card or the Service Tax/GST Registration certificate.
